## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New analyzer rule
- [ ] New code fix
- [ ] Enhancement (non-breaking change that improves existing functionality)

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`dotnet test`)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated `AnalyzerReleases.Unshipped.md` (for new rules)

## New Analyzer Checklist (if applicable)

- [ ] Added diagnostic ID to `DiagnosticIds.cs`
- [ ] Added descriptor to `DiagnosticDescriptors.cs`
- [ ] Created analyzer in appropriate `Analyzers/` subfolder
- [ ] Added tests in `tests/Seams.Analyzers.Tests/`
- [ ] Added documentation in `docs/rules/`
